Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution

Standard distributions, with random generation functionalities.

See: Description


  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Distribution
    Statistical distributions, with their common functions.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractDistribution
    Abstract base class for distributions.
    AbstractDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class.
    BetaDistribution
    Beta Distribution with implementation of the regularized incomplete beta function
    BetaDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    CauchyDistribution
    Cauchy distribution.
    CauchyDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    ChiDistribution
    Chi distribution.
    ChiDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    ChiSquaredDistribution
    Chi-Squared distribution (a specialization of the Gamma distribution).
    ChiSquaredDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    ConstantDistribution
    Pseudo distribution, that has a unique constant value.
    ConstantDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    ExponentialDistribution
    Exponential distribution.
    ExponentialDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    ExponentiallyModifiedGaussianDistribution
    Exponentially modified Gaussian (EMG) distribution (ExGaussian distribution) is a combination of a normal distribution and an exponential distribution.
    ExponentiallyModifiedGaussianDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    GammaDistribution
    Gamma Distribution, with random generation and density functions.
    GammaDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class TODO: allow alternate parameterization, with alpha+beta?
    GeneralizedExtremeValueDistribution
    Generalized Extreme Value (GEV) distribution, also known as Fisher–Tippett distribution.
    GeneralizedExtremeValueDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    GeneralizedLogisticAlternateDistribution
    Generalized logistic distribution.
    GeneralizedLogisticAlternateDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    GeneralizedLogisticDistribution
    Generalized logistic distribution.
    GeneralizedLogisticDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    GumbelDistribution
    Gumbel distribution, also known as Log-Weibull distribution.
    GumbelDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    HaltonUniformDistribution
    Halton sequences are a pseudo-uniform distribution.
    HaltonUniformDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class TODO: allow manual parameterization of sequence parameters!
    KappaDistribution
    Kappa distribution, by Hosking.
    KappaDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    LaplaceDistribution
    Laplace distribution also known as double exponential distribution
    LaplaceDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    LogGammaAlternateDistribution
    Alternate Log-Gamma Distribution, with random generation and density functions.
    LogGammaAlternateDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    LogGammaDistribution
    Log-Gamma Distribution, with random generation and density functions.
    LogGammaDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    LogisticDistribution
    Logistic distribution.
    LogisticDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    LogLogisticDistribution
    Log-Logistic distribution also known as Fisk distribution.
    LogLogisticDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    LogNormalDistribution
    Log-Normal distribution.
    LogNormalDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    NormalDistribution
    Gaussian distribution aka normal distribution
    NormalDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    PoissonDistribution
    INCOMPLETE implementation of the poisson distribution.
    PoissonDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    RayleighDistribution
    Rayleigh distribution.
    RayleighDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    SkewGeneralizedNormalDistribution
    Generalized Gaussian distribution by adding a skew term, similar to lognormal distributions.
    SkewGeneralizedNormalDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    StudentsTDistribution
    Student's t distribution.
    StudentsTDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    UniformDistribution
    Uniform distribution.
    UniformDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    WaldDistribution
    Inverse Gaussian distribution aka Wald distribution
    WaldDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class
    WeibullDistribution
    Weibull distribution.
    WeibullDistribution.Parameterizer
    Parameterization class

Package de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.math.statistics.distribution Description

Standard distributions, with random generation functionalities.
